member.name: T:Avalonia.Controls.PanAndZoom.MatrixHelper
member.summary: Avalonia Matrix helper methods.

member.name: M:Avalonia.Controls.PanAndZoom.MatrixHelper.Translate(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Creates a translation matrix using the specified offsets.

member.name: M:Avalonia.Controls.PanAndZoom.MatrixHelper.TranslatePrepend(Avalonia.Matrix,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Prepends a translation around the center of provided matrix.

member.name: M:Avalonia.Controls.PanAndZoom.MatrixHelper.Scale(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Creates a matrix that scales along the x-axis and y-axis.
member.param: Scaling factor that is applied along the x-axis.
Scaling factor that is applied along the y-axis.

member.name: M:Avalonia.Controls.PanAndZoom.MatrixHelper.ScaleAt(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Creates a matrix that is scaling from a specified center.
member.param: Scaling factor that is applied along the x-axis.
Scaling factor that is applied along the y-axis.
The center X-coordinate of the scaling.
The center Y-coordinate of the scaling.

member.name: M:Avalonia.Controls.PanAndZoom.MatrixHelper.ScaleAtPrepend(Avalonia.Matrix,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Prepends a scale around the center of provided matrix.
member.param: Scaling factor that is applied along the x-axis.
Scaling factor that is applied along the y-axis.
The center X-coordinate of the scaling.
The center Y-coordinate of the scaling.

member.name: M:Avalonia.Controls.PanAndZoom.MatrixHelper.ScaleAndTranslate(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Creates a translation and scale matrix using the specified offsets and scales along the x-axis and y-axis.
member.param: Scaling factor that is applied along the x-axis.
Scaling factor that is applied along the y-axis.
member.returns: The created translation and scale matrix.

member.name: M:Avalonia.Controls.PanAndZoom.MatrixHelper.Skew(System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Creates a skew matrix.
member.param: Angle of skew along the X-axis in radians.
Angle of skew along the Y-axis in radians.
member.returns: When the method completes, contains the created skew matrix.

member.name: M:Avalonia.Controls.PanAndZoom.MatrixHelper.Rotation(System.Double)
member.summary: Creates a matrix that rotates.
member.param: Angle of rotation in radians. Angles are measured clockwise when looking along the rotation axis.

member.name: M:Avalonia.Controls.PanAndZoom.MatrixHelper.Rotation(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Creates a matrix that rotates about a specified center.
member.param: The center X-coordinate of the rotation.
The center Y-coordinate of the rotation.

member.name: M:Avalonia.Controls.PanAndZoom.MatrixHelper.Rotation(System.Double,Avalonia.Vector)
member.summary: Creates a matrix that rotates about a specified center.

member.name: M:Avalonia.Controls.PanAndZoom.MatrixHelper.TransformPoint(Avalonia.Matrix,Avalonia.Point)
member.summary: Transforms a point by this matrix.
member.param: The matrix to use as a transformation matrix.
>The original point to apply the transformation.
member.returns: The result of the transformation for the input point.

member.name: T:Avalonia.Controls.PanAndZoom.StretchMode
member.summary: Describes how content is resized to fill its allocated space.

member.name: F:Avalonia.Controls.PanAndZoom.StretchMode.None
member.summary: The content preserves its original size.

member.name: F:Avalonia.Controls.PanAndZoom.StretchMode.Fill
member.summary: The content is resized to fill the destination dimensions. The aspect ratio is not preserved.

member.name: F:Avalonia.Controls.PanAndZoom.StretchMode.Uniform
member.summary: The content is resized to fit in the destination dimensions while it preserves its native aspect ratio.

member.name: F:Avalonia.Controls.PanAndZoom.StretchMode.UniformToFill
member.summary: The content is resized to fill the destination dimensions while it preserves its native aspect ratio. If the aspect ratio of the destination rectangle differs from the source, the source content is clipped to fit in the destination dimensions.
